CustomField.description: Checks if there is an industrial discount approval needed
CustomField.formula:
AND(
Blended_Discount__c > Approved_Discount__c,
OR( AND( CONTAINS(Pricebook_Name__c, 'Express'), Blended_Discount__c > 0.102 ),
AND(
CONTAINS(Pricebook_Name__c, 'Standard'), ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c , 'Direct Monthly'),
OR( AND(SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c < 60, Blended_Discount__c >= 0.05), AND(SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c >=60, Blended_Discount__c >= 0.15) ) ),
OR( AND(CONTAINS(Pricebook_Name__c, 'Standard'),
OR(
AND( SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c < 36, Blended_Discount__c >= 0.0, NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'IND ENT AE NA')) ), AND( SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c >= 36, SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c < 60, Blended_Discount__c >= 0.25, NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'IND ENT AE NA')) ), AND( SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c >= 60, Blended_Discount__c >= 0.35),
AND( SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c < 36, Blended_Discount__c >= 0.20, CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'IND ENT AE NA')
), AND( SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c >= 36, SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c < 60, Blended_Discount__c >= 0.30, CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, 'IND ENT AE NA')
)
) )
) ) )
CustomField.label: Industrial Discount Approval Needed
